1.verse: In the second year of Darius the king, in the sixth month, in the first day of the month, came the word of Jehovah by Haggai the prophet unto Zerubbabel the son of Shealtiel, governor of Judah, and to Joshua the son of Jehozadak, the high priest, saying,
In the seventh month , in the one and twentieth day of the month, came the word of Jehovah by Haggai the prophet, saying,
